statements: SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE is_cyberbully = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE is_victim = FALSE AND is_cyberbully = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email, is_cyberbully, is_victim FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE is_cyberbully = TRUE AND is_victim = FALSE;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE is_victim = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE is_cyberbully = TRUE OR is_victim = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%' AND posts.post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id1, user_id2 FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'friend_request' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 2 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullies;
SELECT id, username FROM victims WHERE date_of_birth = '2000-01-01';
SELECT email FROM cyberbullies WHERE bully_category = 'online';
SELECT id, username, date_of_birth FROM victims ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullies;
SELECT id, username, email FROM cyberbullies WHERE bully_category = 'Verbal';
SELECT username, email FROM cyberbullies WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT cb.username AS bully_username, v.username AS victim_username, m.message FROM cyberbullies cb JOIN victims v ON cb.id = v.id JOIN messages m ON cb.id = m.sender_id WHERE v.victim_category = 'Physical' AND m.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY m.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, post_text FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM reports WHERE post_id = '456e89b-12d3-a456-4266-123e4567';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT reporter_id, reported_id, report_text FROM reports WHERE reporter_id = 2 AND reported_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, bully_level FROM bullies WHERE report_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, bully_level FROM bullies WHERE bully_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
